synopsis.text: Conan Edogawa, a brilliant detective trapped in a child's body, finds himself entangled in a perilous game of cat and mouse with a cunning bomber who has scattered explosives throughout the city. As the clock ticks down, Conan must unravel the mastermind's motives and identity before the bombs detonate, causing mass destruction and endangering countless lives, including that of his dear friend Ran Mouri. The stakes are higher than ever as Conan navigates this explosive case, where every wrong move could be his last. Can he outsmart the bomber in time and save the city from chaos? Join Conan on this thrilling adventure as he races against the clock to solve the mystery and protect those he holds dear.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
